law.catch_line: After a ground lease is registered, the ground lease holder shall promptly notify the Department of:...
law.text:
After a ground lease is registered, the ground lease holder shall promptly notify the Department of:
A change in the name or address of the ground lease holder, leasehold tenant, or person to whom the ground rent payment is sent;
A redemption of the ground lease; and
Any other information the Department requires.
